pages.text: $(l)Category:$() Small Herbivore $(br)$(l)Tamable:$() False $(br)$(l)Aggression:$() Peaceful $(br)$(l)Type:$() Solo Hunter $(br)$(l)Found In:$() Wetlands
Journal Page by $(l)Unknown Survivor$() $(br2)The Giant Crop Snail is an ancient species of snail that preys on crops and plants. They will destroy farms if they can get into them.
